class.rdfs:comment: A reservation for a taxi.\n\nNote: This type is for information about actual reservations, e.g. in confirmation emails or HTML pages with individual confirmations of reservations. For offers of tickets, use [[Offer]].
class.rdfs:label: TaxiReservation

schema:partySize.rdfs:comment: Number of people the reservation should accommodate.
schema:partySize.rdfs:label: partySize

schema:pickupLocation.rdfs:comment: Where a taxi will pick up a passenger or a rental car can be picked up.
schema:pickupLocation.rdfs:label: pickupLocation

schema:pickupTime.rdfs:comment: When a taxi will pickup a passenger or a rental car can be picked up.
schema:pickupTime.rdfs:label: pickupTime
